Key Match Events: Luis Gil pitched six sparkling innings in his return from a back injury, and the New York Yankees beat the Chicago Cubs 3-0.
Aaron Judge doubled to left, Torres scored, Soto to third.
Wells singled to left, Soto scored and Judge scored.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The game was held at Wrigley Field with an attendance of 40,101.
The game lasted 2 hours and 42 minutes.
